/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the scene. Cars and pedestrians animate the street, adding life to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the scene.
